attributes.action: Open golf courses before end of February
attributes.additional_details:
It is extremely unlikely to transmit infection through playing golf limited to scheduled two balls only

You are less likely to transmit and infection through playing golf than going out for a walk or to buy your groceries
attributes.background: Open golf courses with restrictions to two balls only before the end of February

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Allow golf to be played with appropriate safety measures
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167

Allow socially distanced golf for those who have had vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571635
